LanguageData.EnablePinningResourcesTip: Ctrl click on things in the resource readout to pin them to the top (category mode only)
LanguageData.ShowHideResourceListTip: Hide the resource readout on the left of the screen
LanguageData.ProjectStalled: Research project requirements are not met
LanguageData.SetButtonsFromBuildo: Add buttons using the Mint build menu (ctrl click architect menu)
LanguageData.BillSearchTip:
Searchable words include:

Any words in bill labels or product labels e.g. pants

Stuff catagories e.g. leather

Body part groups e.g. head

Tags e.g. industrial

Layers e.g. overhead
LanguageData.MintWheelRightClickDesc: Open the Mint wheel on right click instead of opening the architect menu
LanguageData.AutoFocusSearchDesc: Automatically focus the search box to start typing each time the build menu is opened
LanguageData.OverrideArchitectTabDesc: Make the mint build menu the default architect tab (hold ctrl for default)
LanguageData.OverrideResearchTabDesc: Make the mint research menu the default research tab (hold ctrl for default)
LanguageData.AutoprojectstepDesc: Automatically start the next research project step to complete the target project
